description:
This course gives you a solid foundation to edit their own or the customer's site in the WordPress CMS, this is the beginning of time to become an expert working in WordPress.

Installing Wordpress, theme installation, working with categories and posts, pages, plugins, menus, widgets, theme editor, how to build homepage, expert advice how to create quality content.

Why choose this course:

  • I will give you a lot of tips that have helped me to successfully make more than a hundred websites for clients all over the world
  • I've created a custom WordPress theme from scratch that will be used in this course
  • I'll show you how to properly set up the text with pictures within posts and pages, that looks nice on the website
  • I'll show you how to make a beautiful homepage
  • Gives you a solid foundation to work with websites
Why choose WordPress
  • With the basic knowledge you can make a beautiful website
  • Using Wordpress for your business saves you money
  • Over 25% websites in the world are in WordPress CMS
  • Search engines loves WordPress
  • WordPress is mobile friendly CMS
Web design in Wordpress is your best decision, and this course will help you be successful in it.
title: WordPress for beginners - Best way to  learn WordPress
